movies.title: The Notebook
movies.plotSummary: In this romantic drama, Noah Calhoun and Allie Hamilton fall deeply in love one summer in the 1940s, but are soon separated by societal pressures and World War II. Despite the obstacles, their love endures, as they reconnect years later and reflect on the enduring power of true love.

movies.title: Finding Nemo
movies.plotSummary: This animated adventure follows the journey of Marlin, a clownfish, as he searches for his son Nemo who has been captured by a diver and taken to a dentist's office aquarium. Along the way, Marlin encounters Dory, a friendly but forgetful blue tang fish, and together they embark on a remarkable oceanic adventure filled with colorful characters, challenges, and heartwarming moments. 'Finding Nemo' is beloved by audiences of all ages for its stunning animation, engaging story, and messages of friendship, courage, and perseverance.

movies.title: Top Gun: Maverick
movies.plotSummary: In this sequel to the 1986 classic, Maverick returns to train a new generation of pilots, including Bradley 'Rooster' Bradshaw, the son of Maverick's late friend and Radar Intercept Officer, Nick 'Goose' Bradshaw. As Maverick confronts his past and navigates the challenges of the modern military, he must also inspire his trainees and earn their respect as a legendary fighter pilot.
